verbose_text: Consistent with our findings, Zhang et al. reported that PGC-1alpha expression in ovarian tumors was downregulated compared with normal ovaries and observed that overexpression of PGC-1alpha significantly and specifically induced cell apoptosis and decreased the Bcl-2 / Bax expression ratio in a human ovarian carcinoma cell line 26.
evidence: PGC-1alpha significantly and specifically induced cell apoptosis
